name: 黃有評
objective:
This goal of this course is to provide fundamental concepts and advanced applications of fuzzy sets and algebraic operations, fuzzy reasoning, fuzzy logic controls and fuzzy system design so that students can apply them to their research in the competitive world.
BTW, some AI, AIoT related topics and their applications will be also presented and discussed in this course.
schedule:
week 1~2: Introduction 
week 3~4: Fuzzy sets, AI, AIoT systems
week 5~6: Fuzzy relations
week 7~8: Membership functions, fuzzification and defuzzification
week 9: Mid-term exam.
week 10~12: Logic and fuzzy systems
week 13~14: Automated methods for fuzzy systems
week 15~16: Fuzzy classification
week 17: Fuzzy control systems, AIoT applications
week 18: Final exam
materials:
1. Li-Xin Wang, A Course in Fuzzy Systems and Control, 1st Ed., Pearson, 全威圖書代理
2. Lecture notes will be available at iPlus.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG13：氣候行動（Climate Action）SDG14：水下生命（Life below Water）
課程是否導入AI: ● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）● 簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）● 深入探討 AI 的原理與應用（Explore the principles and applications of AI in depth）
